: Ensure that only authorized users have access to this view, as it contains sensitive billing information.
: Consider implementing row-level security or data masking for sensitive columns, such as billed amounts and account numbers.
: Maintain logs of access to this view to monitor usage and detect unauthorized access attempts.

: Consider partitioning large tables by billing period to enhance query performance and manageability.
